entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 2:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
